faqs.question: How quickly can you start service?
faqs.answer: We typically schedule new customers within 3-5 business days. For urgent requests, call us directly at (208) 870-4947!

faqs.question: Do you offer one-time services or just ongoing contracts?
faqs.answer: Both! Whether you need a one-time cleanup or weekly maintenance, we're flexible to meet your needs.

faqs.question: What areas do you serve?
faqs.answer: We proudly serve Boise, Meridian, Nampa, Caldwell, and surrounding areas in the Treasure Valley.

faqs.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faqs.answer: Yes! We carry full liability insurance and all necessary licenses for your protection and peace of mind.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, check, and all major credit cards for your convenience.

services.name: Lawn Maintenance
services.description: Regular mowing, edging, and trimming to keep your lawn looking its best year-round

services.name: Landscape Design
services.description: Custom landscape design and installation tailored to your property and vision

services.name: Fertilization & Weed Control
services.description: Professional treatment programs to promote healthy, green lawns

services.name: Spring & Fall Cleanup
services.description: Seasonal cleanup services including leaf removal, debris clearing, and bed preparation

services.name: Mulching & Edging
services.description: Fresh mulch installation and professional edging for clean, defined landscape beds

services.name: Irrigation Services
services.description: Sprinkler system installation, maintenance, and repairs to keep your landscape hydrated
